mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM t_food_product WHERE food_id = #{foodId}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT prd.product_id) FROM t_product prd INNER JOIN t_food_product fprd ON prd.product_id = fprd.product_id INNER JOIN t_wine_vintage wvtg ON prd.wine_id = wvtg.wine_id AND prd.vintage_tag = wvtg.vintage_tag INNER JOIN t_wine win ON prd.wine_id = win.wine_id INNER JOIN t_origin org ON win.wine_origin_id = org.wine_origin_id LEFT JOIN t_country ctry ON org.country_id = ctry.country_id LEFT JOIN t_wine_type wtype ON win.wine_type_id = wtype.wine_type_id LEFT JOIN t_winery wry ON win.winery_id = wry.winery_id

SELECT DISTINCT prd.product_id, wvtg.vintage_tag, wvtg.vintage_name, win.wine_id, win.wine_name_eng AS wine_name, wvtg.is_organic_wine, prd.is_recommend, win.wine_type_id, wtype.wine_type_name_eng AS wine_type_name, win.wine_origin_id, org.region_name_eng AS wine_origin_name, org.country_id, ctry.country_name_eng AS country_name, win.winery_id, wry.winery_name_eng AS winery_name, win.wine_img_id, win.updated_at FROM t_product prd INNER JOIN t_food_product fprd ON prd.product_id = fprd.product_id INNER JOIN t_wine_vintage wvtg ON prd.wine_id = wvtg.wine_id AND prd.vintage_tag = wvtg.vintage_tag INNER JOIN t_wine win ON prd.wine_id = win.wine_id INNER JOIN t_origin org ON win.wine_origin_id = org.wine_origin_id LEFT JOIN t_country ctry ON org.country_id = ctry.country_id LEFT JOIN t_wine_type wtype ON win.wine_type_id = wtype.wine_type_id LEFT JOIN t_winery wry ON win.winery_id = wry.winery_id
limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

sql.if: and (win.wine_name_eng like concat('%',#{wineNameEng},'%') or win.wine_name_cht like concat('%',#{wineNameEng},'%') or win.wine_name_chs like concat('%',#{wineNameEng},'%') )
